Located in the city center of this growing metropolis and part of the LuLu International Shopping Mall, our 5-star Kochi hotel offers refined comfort for every traveler. Relax in our stylish hotel rooms and suites, each with upscale amenities and 24-hour room service. Savor delicious international cuisine in our restaurants and lounges, get pampered at our spa, go for a swim in our outdoor pool, or work out in our 24-hour fitness center. Our venues offer a sophisticated backdrop for meetings, social events and weddings, each complemented by our world-class catering and services. Nearby, the area's most compelling points of interest await, from Cherai Beach and Bolgatty Palace to business and medical centers such Aster Medcity, Amrita Hospital, Cochin International Airport, the convention center and Infopark. Whether staying with us for work or enjoying a getaway, we look forward to welcoming you to our luxury Kochi Marriott Hotel in India. Experience authentic Kerala at Cassava! Come taste our traditional dishes with a unique twist at Cassava, an authentic Kerala cuisine fine dine restaurant. Our modern Kochi, Kerala, hotel, located inside Kakkanad's vibrant Infopark, offers breakfast, easy access to the airport and sits near many of the area's most popular attractions. Fort Kochi, Lulu Mall, Aster Medcity & Rajagiri hospital are also near our hotel. Swim in our rooftop infinity pool, exercise in our fully equipped fitness center, unwind in our rejuvenating spa or dine at one of our hotel restaurants. Plan your next business meeting in one of our six event venues and take advantage of our expert planning and catering services. In the evening, retreat to a spacious room or suite with plush bedding, free Wi-Fi and stunning views of the Kakkanad cityscape. Look forward to an exceptional stay at Four Points by Sheraton Kochi Infopark. Unlock Rewards Receive INR 500 credit towards any of our services (excluding room charges) during your stay. There's a private entrance at the bed and breakfast for the convenience of those who stay. FAQs about B&Bs in Cochin How much does it cost to stay at a B&B in Cochin? On average, a B&B in Cochin costs $31 per night (based on Booking.com prices). How much is a B&B in Cochin for this weekend? The average price per night for a B&B in Cochin this weekend is $31 (based on Booking.com prices). How much would a B&B in Cochin cost tonight? La Lune Fort Kochi , Oshin Home Stay , and ChristVille are some of our most popular B&Bs in Cochin. Which B&Bs in Cochin offer great breakfasts? For B&Bs in Cochin serving highly-rated breakfasts, try La Lune Fort Kochi , Green Woods Bethlehem , and ChristVille . Which B&Bs in Cochin are good for couples? These B&Bs in Cochin are highly rated by couples: Gramam Homestay, Cochin , La Lune Fort Kochi , and Fortis Rooms . What B&Bs in Cochin have nice views? Palm Grove Service Villa , 976 Panangad , and Calvin's Inn have received great reviews from guests in Cochin about the views from these B&Bs. B&Bs That Guests Love in Cochin (/searchresults.html?city=-2093645&nflt=sth%3D2&) See all (/searchresults.html?city=-2093645&nflt=sth%3D2&) (/hotel/in/forte-kochi.html) Forte Kochi (/hotel/in/forte-kochi.html) B&B in Cochin (/hotel/in/forte-kochi.html) Avg. price/night: $264 9.0 Wonderful 469 reviews Excellent room with high ceilings and a spacious bathroom. Aesthetically pleasing design throughout the hotel. The courtyard pool was lovely. The morning heritage walk was really good. The breakfast buffet was the best I had during my trip to Kerala (out of 5 hotels). Easy parking. Great location for a little bit of shopping and walking around to see the sights in this part of Kochi. Welcoming staff who were flexible and patient. Generally the hotel ticked all the boxes for a boutique stay. Show more Show less Vassilena Young couple (/hotel/in/chameleon-beach-resort-cherai.html) Chameleon Beach Resort, Cherai (/hotel/in/chameleon-beach-resort-cherai.html) B&B in Cochin (/hotel/in/chameleon-beach-resort-cherai.html) Avg. price/night: $29 8.7 Excellent 4 reviews A brilliant location if you’re looking for a quiet beach across the road with backwater a few hundred metres away. Chameleon has everything you need, and Rose is a great host and a great cook! Show more Show less Laurence Young couple (/hotel/in/the-fort-bungalow-fort-kochi.html) The Fort Bungalow (/hotel/in/the-fort-bungalow-fort-kochi.html) B&B in Cochin (/hotel/in/the-fort-bungalow-fort-kochi.html) Avg. price/night: $56 9.5 Exceptional 270 reviews Booked a night here because of the good reviews. It was totally worth it. Great location. Very clean. charming decoration. Loved it. The host was helpful, kind and direct. Show more Show less Marcus Solo traveler (/hotel/in/daffodils-luxury-airport-suites.html) Daffodils Luxury Airport Suites (/hotel/in/daffodils-luxury-airport-suites.html) B&B in Cochin (/hotel/in/daffodils-luxury-airport-suites.html) Avg. price/night: $33 9.7 Exceptional 36 reviews Clean spacious room, quiet place, bathroom accessories, good cheap breakfast. Staff can help you to order food from restaurants and provide cutlery to eat in the room. Excellent wi-fi. Pickup from airport is available for extra price. Conditioner and fridge in the room. Very nice and helpful staff. Payment by foreign card / google pay available. Show more Show less Margarita Young couple (/hotel/in/fortis-rooms.html) Fortis Rooms (/hotel/in/fortis-rooms.html) B&B in Cochin (/hotel/in/fortis-rooms.html) Avg. price/night: $21 9.4 Wonderful 41 reviews I received a very warm welcome from the family. Pema was exceptionally helpful and kind, sorting out everything I needed. It really made my first few days in India much easier and more relaxed. Her mother prepared excellent breakfasts to order. My room was simple, but comfortable. Importantly, the quiet fan and air conditioning both worked impeccably. Water, tea and coffee all provided. The property is located a little way out of Fort Kochi and Mattancherry, but both are walkable. Thoroughly recommended. Many thanks. Show more Show less Lee Solo traveler (/hotel/in/neemrana-s-the-tower-house.html) Neemrana's- Tower House (/hotel/in/neemrana-s-the-tower-house.html) B&B in Cochin (/hotel/in/neemrana-s-the-tower-house.html) Avg. price/night: $108 8.3 Very Good 326 reviews Neemrana’s Tower house is a charming boutique hotel in the middle of fort kochi near the beach and restaurants nearby. We enjoyed the pool and garden setting and the friendly staff. Show more Show less Paul Beumer Young couple (/hotel/in/dutch-bungalow.html) Dutch Bungalow (/hotel/in/dutch-bungalow.html) B&B in Cochin (/hotel/in/dutch-bungalow.html) Avg. price/night: $92 8.0 Very Good 365 reviews There was lots of fresh fruit and a good choice of Sri Lankan spicy dishes, for breakfast, lunch and dinner. The staff was very friendly. As a heritage building, it is charming with large rooms. Show more Show less John Group (/hotel/in/abad-plaza.html) Hotel Abad Plaza (/hotel/in/abad-plaza.html) B&B in Ernakulam, Cochin (/hotel/in/abad-plaza.html) Avg. price/night: $48 8.0 Very Good 1,475 reviews Friendly staff. Great location. Excellent breakfast Show more Show less Grace Family with young children (/hotel/in/old-harbour.html) Old Harbour Hotel (/hotel/in/old-harbour.html) B&B in Cochin (/hotel/in/old-harbour.html) Avg. price/night: $240 9.1 Wonderful 170 reviews Really lovely hotel in great location for exploring Kochi. The pool is beautiful, surrounded by well-maintained gardens. The restaurant overlooks the garden and our room had its own small private garden. The staff are wonderful - hospitable and really helpful. They organised a very reasonably priced private boat trip which was magical. Thank you to a fantastic team for such a memorable holiday.
